dct_title_s: Map of the Turcoman Steppe and northn. Khorassan to illustrate Sir H. Rawlinson's paper 'The road to Merv'
dct_description_sm: Routes taken by Russian forces towards Merv, and approximate courses of ancient roads, are shown. Areas of desert, marshland, and dry lake and river beds are shown. Relief shown by hachures. From: Proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society and monthly record of geography. Vol. 1 (1879), no. 3, pp. 161-91; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J6873
